message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's truly exceptional and I believe it will greatly benefit you. Given its value, I'm proposing a price of $9,500 for this opportunity.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $8,500?
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value of our product and your interest, I propose a price of $9,000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $8,500 for the product.
I appreciate your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept a price of $8,750 for the product. This offers a fair compromise between our positions.
